name: CCB Stuffed Dates
preparation:
1. Preheat oven to 375Â° F. Line a Sheet Pan with a Sheet Pan Liner.
  2. In bowl, combine cream cheese, mayo, and dip mix.
  3. Cut a slit lengthwise in each date; remove pits. Fill each date with a heaping tsp of dip mix.
  4. Place dates on pan; bake for 8 min or until warmed through.
  5. Remove from oven; arrange on a platter. Drizzle with honey and top with slivered almonds or pomegranate seeds, if desired.
tips: Instead of honey, drizzle with good quality balsamic reduction.
